column4: I know but I want to make sure I have the right source.  I was using Kubuntu with KDE4 but when I installed the update too 4.2 X got hosed somehow.
Then I could not get kubuntu to install.  So I installed ubuntu.
I would like to run both KDE 4.2 and Gnome.
there's nothing stopping you from running kde-programs under gnome and gnome-programs under kde
